com.caseybrooks.androidbibletools.data

Interface Formatter

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultFormatter, DefaultFormatter.DashedLetter, DefaultFormatter.Dashes, DefaultFormatter.FirstLetters, DefaultFormatter.Markup, DefaultFormatter.Normal, DefaultFormatter.RandomWords

    public interface Formatter
    Class to format the text output of a Verse object. Rather than setting flags on the Verse itself, set flags on this Formatter and assign the formatter to the Verse. This makes it easier to have consistent output, because the same Formatter can be assigned to multiple Verses
